prompt:
Use case: illustration-story
Asset type: project page hero image (Sunday funnies comic strip)
Primary request: a witty, satirical newspaper-style comic strip about an e-commerce data pipeline
Scene/background: floating cloud city with pipes and a central pool
Subject: original cartoon engineers and shoppers interacting with a tangled pipe system
Style/medium: classic newspaper comic line art, thick black outlines, flat pastel colors, subtle paper texture
Composition/framing: wide horizontal strip with 4 panels, thin gutters, each panel a clear beat
Lighting/mood: bright daytime, lighthearted, deadpan humor
Color palette: soft sky blues, warm ochres, muted greens
Materials/textures: inked lines, watercolor wash fill
Quality: high
Text (verbatim): ""
Constraints: show the pipeline stages through props and icons only (brooms, filters, trophies); no brand names; no readable text; no logos; no watermark; original characters
Avoid: photorealism, 3D render, stock-photo vibe

Use case: illustration-story
Asset type: project page hero image (Sunday funnies comic strip)
Primary request: a playful 3-panel newspaper comic explaining data flowing from messy inputs to clean insights
Scene/background: whimsical pipe-and-tank factory in the clouds
Subject: cartoon workers riding carts, scrubbing data bubbles, and presenting a polished dashboard as a trophy
Style/medium: vintage Sunday funnies look, crisp pen-and-ink linework, flat color fills
Composition/framing: wide strip with 3 panels, large middle panel for the main gag, small panels left/right for setup and punchline
Lighting/mood: sunny, upbeat, gently satirical
Color palette: pastel blues, creams, warm brass, pops of teal
Materials/textures: paper grain, ink stippling
Quality: high
Text (verbatim): ""
Constraints: no readable text; no brand names; no logos; no watermark; original characters; keep panels clearly separated
Avoid: photorealism, painterly oil style, heavy gradients

Use case: illustration-story
Asset type: project page hero image (Sunday funnies comic strip)
Primary request: a 5-panel satirical comic strip about a data lake pipeline with comedic physical metaphors
Scene/background: cross-section of a floating pipe maze feeding a round pool
Subject: engineers, tiny forklifts, and boxes of orders moving through filters, valves, and a sparkling lake
Style/medium: classic newspaper comic strip, bold outlines, flat color, slight off-white paper tint
Composition/framing: wide horizontal strip with 5 panels, consistent border weight, readable silhouettes
Lighting/mood: bright, quirky, dry humor
Color palette: sky blue, tan pipes, seafoam water, muted red accents
Materials/textures: inked lines, light watercolor shading
Quality: high
Text (verbatim): ""
Constraints: no readable text; no brand names; no logos; no watermark; original characters; avoid direct imitation of any specific artist
Avoid: CGI, glossy 3D, heavy blur
